SAXEntityParser - Class in org.netbeans.api.xml.parsers
SAX parser wrapper allowing to parse parsed XML entities (including DTDs) for wellformedness.
SAXEntityParser(XMLReader) - Constructor for class org.netbeans.api.xml.parsers.SAXEntityParser
Creates a new instance of general entity parser.
SAXEntityParser(XMLReader, boolean) - Constructor for class org.netbeans.api.xml.parsers.SAXEntityParser
Creates a new instance of SAXEntityParser.
setCharacterStream(Reader) - Method in class org.netbeans.api.xml.parsers.DocumentInputSource
This InputSource is backended by Swing's Document.
